title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 139 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
January 19, 2018
On Friday, January 19, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 139, the “FISA Amendments Reauthorization Act of 2017,” which extends and modifies Title VII of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act relating to foreign intelligence gathering.
